locations.title: Walton Truck Stop
locations.content: Walton Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Parking is 20 dollars for 24hrs and shower is 15 dollars. It's clean and shower are nice. It's right across from the walmart dc
Foreign owned. $20 to park, $15 for a shower. By the looks of the truck stop, the showers can‚Äôt be worth $15.

$15 to park $12 for shower, unfortunately I had to do both since I delivered next door to WM DC with only an hour left on my 14 clock  around rush hour & next morning I took a shower only because I didn't had a preplan or load yet and ‚Ä¶

Terrible $20.00 parking every 12 hrs and 15.00 for shower. If you move from your paid parking spot you lose it and have to pay again. Stay away from this place! Greedy only take money to send back home

locations.title: Marathon
locations.content: Marathon may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ down....HORRIBLE. Bathrooms and showers disgusting and not to mention they charge PER PERSON so if your a truck driver with your wife or husband get ready to pay $30 to shower, parking $20 and the food is expensive. What in the world yall ‚Ä¶
Good food options, truck parking is easily accessible and easy to get into the Walmart DC from. Parking for a truck is $10. Single shower, clean but also $10. Towels have seen better days. ‚Ä¶

$15 FOR PARKING AND $10 FOR SHOWER, 2 WASH CLOTHES, 1 TOWEL, AND FƒπOOR MAT IS PROVIDED. WAFFLE HOUSE WALKING DISTANCE. WALMART DISTRIBUTION CENTER ACROSS THE STREET. THANKS FOR THE HOSPITALITY DURING MY VISIT.  You cannot park in front of ‚Ä¶

Got here on 9/10 at 1600, the staff was friendly, helpful, and professional. Cost $10 to shower and $10 to park. Hell these bigger truck stops CHARGE MORE! So it‚Äôs not a problem to help the little guy out. üíØ ‚Ä¶
Nothing to complain about....Food was above average and priced good. The store and shower were both clean...and the ladies working were friendly and helpful. Need more places like this.
This isn't a bad little truck stop. 10 dollars to park. 10 for a shower. They are friendly and there's a Waffle House next door.

locations.title: Pilot Travel Center
locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Really, Pilot?  You‚Äôre going to give the women two whole shower rooms to use the restroom but us men have to use the porta-crappers outside?? ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and unprofessional staff I've ever encountered at a pilot . Waiting 2+ hours on a shower while the staff is walking around dancing with loud bluetooth speakers hanging around their necks . I can promise you that not one of these people can ‚Ä¶

Clean place plenty of parking the parking lot is smooth but I just showered in shower number 3 and there is 0 cold water. I take cold showers and haven't had a hot shower in years and it was disgusting

Spots are spacious, plenty of free parking. Wait times for a shower can suck during mid-afternoon but unlike other truck stops, there's a hard working employee watching the showers and cleaning them immediately after use. Plus an iHop
I happen to have busted water pipes recently and decided to use the shower at the local Pilot Flying J. ‚Ä¶

Great place except for the showers!!! Always loved stopping here because it‚Äôs one of the most updated, cleanest around & has lots of food choices in the area. However, took a shower that was disgusting!!! The room hadn‚Äôt been cleaned in a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ your all just ignorant. This is how pilots are it's why I stop. It is a classic nice place with lots off food options with in .5mile walk. It is exactly what I expected when I walked in good people nice place clean shower nothing to fancy.

Tina the cashier was very helpful and kind to help me.  Shower had big nice water pressure.
Floor had sticky old gum on sink floor stuck to my flip flops.  Toilet roll holder needed wiped clean.
‚Ä¶ This place is filthy. Shower had mold on ceiling, flys and the vent was covered in dust. ‚Ä¶
Great store. Plenty of truck parking. Gracious clerk allowed me a shower tonight after finding out the one I had on my app had expired. Thanks young lady for your kindness!!!!

The Mgr. There allowed a snaggertooth man who cleans the shower to call me a gay slur in front of him doing a heated argument over check fees after I purchase fuel. Very unprofessional and he tried getting me arrested after I called them a ‚Ä¶

Very nice addition a long awaited Love's truck  stop. I've enjoyed the a hot shower the Godfather Pizza needs improvement but and the Hardee's is Awesome no compliments grate layout in and out great job guy keep up.the good work üôèüëçüòè ‚Ä¶

40 minutes for a shower,,, at 11:30 at night is ridiculous!!! 5 employees only 1 working,,, very slow!!!

locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This TA had plenty of parking when we pulled in at 2 am which was nice because most are filled by then. The bathrooms were very clean. Has a nice selection of items. The staff was nice and friendly. James, waited on me in the morning before we left. He greeted me with a smile and was very nice.
About 5 showers were open and dirty and not cleaned, even the one that was assigned to me as a clean and ready shower. Are you serious?

I stopped here to fuel.up and use the bathroom a couple years back. I had to go to the bathroom bad and use the front door to go to a lady room to be told I wasn't welcome there I said why the red hair guy was rude and said that none of ‚Ä¶

TA‚Äôs are amongst thee worst truck stop chains ever. Their app is just as grungy as their stores. Parking lots and bathrooms are a disaster. They stopped innovating in the mid 2000s and just continued to fall from there. Whoever is in charge of the chain is just leeching money at this point bro.

I like to stop here because it's lit up and safe. I've never had any issues and I do have my kids usually and it's nice to know they have clean restrooms. They also have nice little trinkets which is why I stopped in today. Looking for an ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Flying J Travel Center
locations.content: Flying J Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: This is a great Flying J to visit! Show out to Angela , she is always nice, kind, helpful, and always makes everyone feel welcomed when they enter the store. The other staff is great too. The showers are always spacious and clean. The ‚Ä¶

Cashiers and overnight crew were great and friendly. Very helpful. Overall store looked great. Restrooms needed some touching up but other than that. It‚Äôs a huge store and great place to stop while traveling. The shelves were stocked and clean. No issues here. Hopefully I‚Äôll be able to stop through here again.

I stopped at this truck stop and enjoyed my quick visit.  It was clean and the employees were friendly.  One particular employee by the name of Kahlif really went out of his way to make sure I and other customers didn't have to wait long ‚Ä¶

I am very disappointed. I was at the Flying J on August 18, 2025. I was going into the shower and male worker decided to come in and assault me. I reported to Pilot and Flying J corporate  office.I did a police report and still. I had not ‚Ä¶

Great lunch buffet. Tasty meatloaf, mashed potatoes, green beans and more. The dog had a good walk and the bathrooms were clean. There were some fresh snacks and brewed coffee. Laundromat, TV area, and showers for long haul travel

This is a well stocked, well maintained and clean place to stop while on a road trip. Their pizza looks amazing. If I were a trucker, I‚Äôd make this my place to stop as it has showers, laundry facilities, and a nice little lounge on top of all the available food and drinks.

I hate leaving bad reviews,they have plenty of truck parking,I was happy to get a spot right away but the shower was a disappointment,the cleaning person was just standing in the back chilling on their phone and never cleaned the shower,I ‚Ä¶

Great Flying J.  Plenty of parking for truck drivers.  We stopped at 10:30 PM on a Thursday evening and there was still plenty of parking left.  That is so rare!  It was quiet and so much cleaner than other Flying J‚Äôs we have stopped at.  Bathrooms and inside was clean too.
